casebody.data:
S
v.
Christopher Nathaniel JONES. No. 389PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 8, 2004. Daniel P. O'Brien, Assistant Attorney General, C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th day of November 2004 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Jones) shall have up to and including the 22nd day of November 2004 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of November 2004."

*640
